name: The Connaught Place
address: 2296 E Hastings St, Vancouver, BC V5L 1V4, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Bread Pakora/Bread Fitter
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy exterior with soft, flavorful filling. Deep-fried goodness with a hint of spice. Perfect for a savory snack or appetizer. Aromatic and satisfying.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheese Tomato Grilled Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Melted cheese with fresh tomato slices and basil, grilled between golden-brown bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy / Grilled Chicken Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Tender chicken patty topped with melted cheese on a toasted bun. Served with golden fries or chips. Comforting and satisfying choice.

hasMenuItem.name: Veg Samosa
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas. Served with tangy tamarind chutney. Perfect appetizer with a balance of savory and sweet flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Pesto Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Zesty pesto paired with melted mozzarella on ciabatta bread. Aromatic and satisfying combination for a flavorful sandwich.

hasMenuItem.name: Smoked Salmon Cream Cheese Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Savory smoked salmon with creamy cream cheese, seasoned with salt and pepper on rye bread. A satisfying and flavorful sandwich option.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Veg / Creamy Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Hearty veggie burger with hashbrown, cheese, and choice of spicy or creamy sauce on a bun. Flavorful twist on the classic burger, satisfying and flavorful with a satisfying combination of ingredients.

hasMenuItem.name: Indian Masala Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Spiced with cardamom, cinnamon, and cloves, this Indian masala tea offers a robust blend of black tea and aromatic spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Milk Shake
hasMenuItem.description: Decadent chocolate shake topped with whipped cream and chocolate syrup. Creamy, rich, and indulgent treat perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth.

hasMenuItem.name: Pineapple Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet and tangy tropical beverage made from fresh pineapple, served chilled. A refreshing and hydrating drink with natural flavors.

hasMenuItem.description: A paneer loaded wrap is a tasty fusion dish combining Indian cottage cheese with veggies, sauces, and spices, all wrapped in a soft tortilla, perfect for a quick and flavorful meal on-the-go.

hasMenuItem.name: Butter Chicken Rice Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Tender chicken in a rich, creamy butter sauce, typically includes herbs and spices, served over rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Salmon Rice Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Seared salmon atop a bed of white rice, typically includes a mix of vegetables such as bell peppers and onions, garnished with sesame seeds and a drizzle of Asian sesame sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Chilli Chicken Rice Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Rice topped with spicy chili chicken, typically includes a blend of beans and vegetables, garnished with cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Chickpeas Rice Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Chickpeas and rice form the base, typically accompanied by a medley of vegetables and a light dressing, garnished with fresh herbs.

hasMenuItem.name: Shahi Paneer Rice Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Basmati rice topped with homemade paneer, simmered in a rich, creamy tomato sauce with cashews and traditional Indian spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Budha Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: A blend of rice, typically accompanied by a mix of fresh vegetables, a variety of proteins like tofu or chickpeas, and a flavorful dressing or sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Ultimate Loaded Paneer Wrap

hasMenuItem.name: Butter Chicken Samosa

hasMenuItem.description: Melted cheese with fresh tomato slices and basil, grilled between golden-brown bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Club Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Hearty club sandwich with bacon, ham, turkey, garlic mayo, and cheese on white bread. Savory blend with a touch of pepper and salt for a satisfying bite.

hasMenuItem.description: Zesty pesto paired with melted mozzarella on ciabatta bread. Aromatic and satisfying combination for a flavorful sandwich.

hasMenuItem.description: Decadent avocado spread on toasted rye with spring mix and tomato. Flavorful, satisfying, and aromatic with a refreshing crunch.

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach Egg Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Savory breakfast sandwich with spinach, Mushrooms,  eggs, and gooey cheese on soft bread. Wholesome, flavorful, and satisfying.

hasMenuItem.name: Indian Masala Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Spiced with cardamom, cinnamon, and cloves, this Indian masala tea offers a robust blend of black tea and aromatic spices.

hasMenuItem.description: Rich espresso blended with dark chocolate and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Espresso Black Coffee
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, robust espresso with a deep, intense flavor, crafted from freshly ground coffee beans.

hasMenuItem.name: Bottled Water
hasMenuItem.description: Pure and refreshing bottled water.

hasMenuItem.name: Classic Milk Coffee
hasMenuItem.description: A classic combination of rich coffee and milk, offering a smooth and comforting taste.

hasMenuItem.name: English Tea
hasMenuItem.description: A traditional brew, often served with an option to add milk, capturing the essence of classic English tea ceremonies.

hasMenuItem.name: Americano
hasMenuItem.description: Rich espresso blended with hot water, creating a bold and smooth coffee experience.

hasMenuItem.name: Cafe latte

hasMenuItem.name: Pineapple Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet and tangy tropical beverage made from fresh pineapple, served chilled. A refreshing and hydrating drink with natural flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Orange Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Real Freshly squeezed orange juice bursting with tangy citrus flavor, packed with Vitamin C to start your day off right. Enjoy a refreshing and nutritious beverage.

hasMenuItem.name: Fresh Lemonade
hasMenuItem.description: Lemonade infused with sparkling water for a refreshing twist.

hasMenuItem.name: Mix Vegetable / Fruit Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Vibrant blend of carrot, beet, celery, apple, orange, ginger, and lemon, with a refreshing addition of pomegranate. Create a nutritious and invigorating drink packed with flavor and vitamins.

hasMenuItem.name: Ginger Shot
hasMenuItem.description: Refreshing blend of sparkling water infused with zesty ginger and tangy lime.

hasMenuItem.name: Green Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Vibrant blend of kale, spinach, celery, cucumber, and green apple. Refreshing, nutritious, and packed with vitamins and antioxidants. Enjoy a revitalizing sip of health in every glass.

hasMenuItem.name: Virgin Masala Drink
hasMenuItem.description: A non-alcoholic beverage blending spices typically found in Indian cuisine, offering a unique and invigorating taste experience.

hasMenuItem.name: Watermelon Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Freshly squeezed watermelon juice, bursting with juicy sweetness and refreshing flavors. Perfect thirst-quencher on a hot day. Aromatic and hydrating.

hasMenuItem.name: You Make Juice ( Your Choice of Ingredients)
hasMenuItem.description: Customized refreshing juices made just for you with your choice of ingredients. Create a unique blend that suits your taste buds. Choose from a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Banana Milk Shake
hasMenuItem.description: Refreshing blend of ripe bananas and creamy milk, creating a smooth and rich beverage perfect for a hot day. A delightful treat for banana lovers.

hasMenuItem.description: Decadent chocolate shake topped with whipped cream and chocolate syrup. Creamy, rich, and indulgent treat perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth.

hasMenuItem.name: Mango Lassi
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy and refreshing yogurt drink with sweet and tangy fresh mango chunk..

hasMenuItem.name: Vanilla Milk Shake
hasMenuItem.description: Smooth, creamy vanilla milkshake.

hasMenuItem.name: Strawberry Milk Shake
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy milkshake blended with ripe strawberries for a refreshing, fruity treat.

hasMenuItem.name: Fresh Yogurt Lassi Sweet / Salted
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy, sweet or tangy yogurt drink. Choose from sweet or salted options. Refreshing and wholesome, perfect for cooling down on a hot day.

hasMenuItem.name: Pistachio Milk Sahke
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy blend of pistachio ice cream, milk, topped with chopped pistachios and a hint of saffron.

hasMenuItem.name: Mango Milk Shake
hasMenuItem.description: Velvety smooth milkshake bursting with the sweet and tropical flavor of fresh mango. A refreshing and satisfying drink option.

hasMenuItem.name: Cold Coffee
hasMenuItem.description: Smooth and creamy cold coffee, perfect for a refreshing pick-me-up.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Green Chutney
hasMenuItem.description: Tangy and spicy green chutney made with fresh herbs and spices. Flavorful and aromatic condiment to add a kick to your meal.

hasMenuItem.name: Tangy Red Chutney
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy tangy and flavorful chutney with a hint of spice. Perfect for adding a zesty kick to any dish.

hasMenuItem.name: Peri Peri Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Nice spicy flavoured Peri-Peri sauce is typically made from crushed chiles, lemon, pepper, garlic, salt, onion, bay leaves, vinegar, and oil.

hasMenuItem.name: Garlic Mayo Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Garlic mayo dip is quick and easy to make with mayo, a few cloves of garlic, and a squeeze of lemon juice. Perfect for sandwiches, fries or more.

review.reviewBody: The peri peri paneer sandwich is so delicious! I absolutely loved the cold coffee! Cannot wait to try more items :)
